work.name: Wireless Communication Engineering Laboratory, Manipal University Jaipur
work.position: Associate Researcher in Study of Spectrum Sensing Techniques
work.summary: Implemented a physical experimental setup for energy detection-based spectrum sensing using Software Defined Radio (SDR) and GNU Radio. Addressed challenges in spectrum sensing, such as processing delay, false alarms, misdetection, and weak signal detection. Developed and tested efficient spectrum sensing algorithms to improve detection performance. Performed statistical data analysis and interpretation of the experimental results to validate the effectiveness of the implemented system. Contributed to the development of a flexible and scalable spectrum sensing test bench for future research.

projects.name: BareCodeX
projects.summary: An educational video codec written in C++ from scratch. It demonstrates fundamental video compression techniques by converting raw RGB video to YUV420, applying delta encoding between frames, and compressing the result with DEFLATE (zlib).
